Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at California/Taylor
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Roosevelt, Western, Harrison and California: due to police activity near California/Taylor.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Roosevelt, Western, Harrison, California and over regular route: due to police activity near California/Taylor.

Allow extra travel time.
